metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition
metadata.section_title: Heat Transfer, Air Leakage and Condensation Control

requirements.description: This Section applies to the control of heat transfer, air leakage and condensation in buildings
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to the control of heat transfer, air leakage and condensation in buildings

requirements.description: Insulation shall be installed to maintain continuity over the entire building envelope
requirements.exact_quote: Insulation shall be installed to maintain continuity over the entire building envelope without substantial gaps

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance of walls shall conform to Table 9.25.2.1 based on heating degree days
requirements.exact_quote: Minimum effective thermal resistance of walls shall conform to Table 9.25.2.1

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance of ceilings shall conform to Table 9.25.2.1 based on heating degree days
requirements.exact_quote: Minimum effective thermal resistance of ceilings shall conform to Table 9.25.2.1

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for above-grade walls in Calgary (Zone 7A - 5000+ HDD)
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, above-grade walls shall have effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 3.85

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for ceilings below attics in Calgary (Zone 7A)
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, ceilings below attics shall have effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 8.81

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for basement walls in Calgary (Zone 7A)
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, basement walls shall have effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 2.98

requirements.description: Minimum effective thermal resistance for slab-on-grade perimeter in Calgary (Zone 7A)
requirements.exact_quote: For Climate Zone 7A, slab-on-grade perimeter shall have effective thermal resistance of not less than RSI 2.84

requirements.description: Insulation shall be installed tightly against adjacent assemblies and shall fill cavities completely
requirements.exact_quote: Insulation shall be installed tightly against adjacent assemblies and shall fill cavities completely without compression or gaps

requirements.description: Insulation shall be supported to prevent settling and displacement
requirements.exact_quote: Insulation shall be supported to prevent settling and displacement

requirements.description: An air barrier system shall be installed to provide a continuous barrier to air leakage throughout the building envelope
requirements.exact_quote: An air barrier system shall be installed to provide a continuous barrier to air leakage throughout the building envelope

requirements.description: Air barrier system materials shall be joined together with lapped, caulked or taped joints to form a continuous membrane
requirements.exact_quote: Air barrier system materials shall be joined together with lapped, caulked or taped joints to form a continuous membrane

requirements.description: Penetrations through the air barrier shall be sealed to maintain continuity
requirements.exact_quote: Penetrations through the air barrier shall be sealed to maintain continuity

requirements.description: Maximum air leakage rate for air barrier materials
requirements.exact_quote: Air barrier materials shall have an air leakage rate of not more than 0.02 L/(s*m2) at 75 Pa

requirements.description: A vapour barrier shall be installed on the warm side of insulation in walls, ceilings and floors separating heated from unheated spaces
requirements.exact_quote: A vapour barrier shall be installed on the warm side of insulation in walls, ceilings and floors separating heated from unheated spaces

requirements.description: Maximum water vapour permeance for vapour barrier materials
requirements.exact_quote: Vapour barrier materials shall have a water vapour permeance of not more than 60 ng/(Pa*s*m2)

requirements.description: Minimum thickness for polyethylene vapour barrier
requirements.exact_quote: Polyethylene vapour barriers shall be not less than 0.15 mm thick

requirements.description: Polyethylene vapour barriers shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.34-M
requirements.exact_quote: Polyethylene vapour barriers shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.34-M

requirements.description: Minimum lap for vapour barrier joints
requirements.exact_quote: Joints in vapour barriers shall be lapped not less than 100 mm

requirements.description: Joints in vapour barriers shall occur over framing members or be sealed with tape or sealant
requirements.exact_quote: Joints in vapour barriers shall occur over framing members or be sealed with tape or sealant

requirements.description: Insulation shall be protected from moisture damage during construction and in service
requirements.exact_quote: Insulation shall be protected from moisture damage during construction and in service

requirements.description: Building assemblies shall be designed and constructed to minimize the potential for condensation
requirements.exact_quote: Building assemblies shall be designed and constructed to minimize the potential for condensation

requirements.description: Where insulation is placed on the cold side of a vapour barrier, the ratio of thermal resistance shall ensure the temperature at the vapour barrier remains above the dew point
requirements.exact_quote: Where insulation is placed on the cold side of a vapour barrier, the ratio of thermal resistance shall ensure the temperature at the vapour barrier remains above the dew point under design conditions

tables.title: Minimum Effective Thermal Resistance of Building Components
tables.description: Provides minimum RSI values for walls, ceilings, floors, and foundations based on heating degree days
tables.notes: Calgary is in Climate Zone 7A with approximately 5000 HDD
